install.name: AcyMailing Tag : content insertion
install.author: Acyba
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2018 ACYBA SAS - All rights reserved..
install.description: This AcyMailing plugin enables you to include Joomla Articles in any e-mail sent by AcyMailing

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: customtemplate
param.label: Custom template
param.description: Click on the Custom template button to create a custom layout that will override the default view

param.name: displayart
param.label: Display articles
param.description: Select if you want to display all articles in the popup for article selection or only published articles

param.name: contentaccess
param.label: Content Access
param.description: If you use the automatic article insertion (via the categories tab), AcyMailing will only include articles having the selected access in your Newsletter

param.name: frontendaccess
param.label: Front-end Access
param.description: Using AcyMailing Enterprise, you can restrict the access to this tag system
param.option: Don't display this tag system on the front-end

param.name: metaselect
param.label: Select articles by meta tags
param.description: Do you want to display an interface on the content category insertion to filter articles by meta tags? Meta tags must be separated by a comma.

param.name: integration
param.label: Act for another component
param.description: Some Joomla components use the content table to store their articles. This option enables you to make sure Acy will act for this third part component and not for the default Joomla content system

param.name: wordwrap
param.label: Intro Word Wrapping
param.description: If you insert only the introduction and you didn't insert the read more link, AcyMailing will only load the first XX characters of your content. If you specify 0, AcyMailing won't wrap your content
